member.summary: Get a boolean property from the default parser listener

members.member:
Get a integer property from the default parser listener
Property Name /// Use only if you use the default parser listener Int Value of Property

Get a float property from the default parser listener
Property Name /// Use only if you use the default parser listener Float Value of Property

Get a string property from the default parser listener
Property Name /// Use only if you use the default parser listener String Value of Property

Get a color property from the default parser listener
Property Name /// Use only if you use the default parser listener Color Value of Property

Get the dice property from the default parser listener
Property Name /// Use only if you use the default parser listener Dice Value of Property

member.summary: Render a frame of "Powered by libtcod x.y.z" onto screen.
member.param: If true, credits are transparently added on top of the existing screen. For this to work, this function must be placed between your screen rendering code and the console flush.
member.returns: true when the credits screen is finished, indicating that you no longer need to call it.

member.name: M:libtcodWrapper.RootConsole.GetInstance
member.summary: Modified singleton pattern. Creates the root console based on the behavior values in RootConsole.Width, RootConsole.Height, RootConsole.WindowTitle, RootConsole.Fullscreen, and RootConsole.Font, or gets the already-created console if one exists.

member.name: P:libtcodWrapper.RootConsole.Width
member.summary: Width, in tiles, of the root console window. Attempting to reset this once GetInstance() has been called will result in an exception.

member.name: P:libtcodWrapper.RootConsole.Height
member.summary: Height, in tiles, of the root console window. Attempting to reset this once GetInstance() has been called will result in an exception.

member.name: P:libtcodWrapper.RootConsole.WindowTitle
member.summary: Title for the root console window. Attempting to reset this once GetInstance() has been called will result in an exception.

member.name: P:libtcodWrapper.RootConsole.Fullscreen
member.summary: Whether or not to run the application full-screen. Attempting to reset this once GetInstance() has been called will result in an exception.

member.name: P:libtcodWrapper.RootConsole.Font
member.summary: Font data for a font other than the default "terminal.bmp".
